property.name: hive.metastore.warehouse.dir
property.description: URI of the default location for tables in the default catalog and database.

property.name: datanucleus.schema.autoCreateAll
property.description: Auto creates the necessary schema in the RDBMS at startup if one does not exist. Set this to false after creating it once. To enable auto create also set hive.metastore.schema.verification=false. Auto creation is not recommended in production; run schematool instead.

property.name: hive.metastore.schema.verification
property.description: Enforce metastore schema version consistency. When set to true: verify that version information stored in the RDBMS is compatible with the version of the Metastore jar. Also disable automatic schema migration. Users are required to manually migrate the schema after upgrade, which ensures proper schema migration. This setting is strongly recommended in production. When set to false: warn if the version information stored in RDBMS doesn't match the version of the Metastore jar and allow auto schema migration.

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL
property.description: Connection URL for the JDBC driver

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName
property.description: User name to connect to the RDBMS with

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword
property.description: Password to connect to the RDBMS with. The Metastore uses Hadoop's CredentialProvider API so this does not have to be stored in clear text in your configuration file.

property.name: metastore.try.direct.sql.ddl
property.description: When using Postgres you should set the configuration parameter metastore.try.direct.sql.ddl (previously hive.metastore.try.direct.sql.ddl) to false, to avoid failures in certain operations.

property.name: hive.metastore.rawstore.impl
property.description: As of Hive 3.0 there are two implementations. The default implementation (org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.ObjectStore) queries the database directly. HIVE-16520 introduced a new CachedStore (full class name is org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.cache.CachedStore) that caches retrieved objects in memory on the Metastore.
